snippet: An app for people who like doing things outdoors but don’t want to check the weather report, Foresee will tell you if the conditions outside are right for your favorite activities.
abstract: Gadgetwise blog; Foresee is app for people who like doing things outdoors but do not want to check the weather report; it will tell you if the conditions outside are right for favorite activities.
lead_paragraph: An app for people who like doing things outdoors but don’t want to check the weather report, Foresee will tell you if the conditions outside are right for your favorite activities.

headline.main: What’s Today Good For? Foresee Will Let You Know
